subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: That Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson enter the United States Open having won four of the past five majors will only heighten expectations at Winged Foot Golf Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y., beginning Thursday.
snippet: That Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson enter the United States Open having won four of the past five majors will only heighten expectations at Winged Foot Golf Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y., beginning Thursday.
